mapper.insert: insert into survey_answers (survey_answer_id, company_id, survey_response_id, survey_question_id, value_text, value_rating, value_choice, created_at) values (#{surveyAnswerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{companyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{surveyResponseId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{surveyQuestionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{valueText,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{valueRating,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{valueChoice,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update survey_answers set company_id = #{companyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, survey_response_id = #{surveyResponseId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, survey_question_id = #{surveyQuestionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, value_text = #{valueText,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, value_rating = #{valueRating,jdbcType=INTEGER}, value_choice = #{valueChoice,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, created_at = #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where survey_answer_id = #{surveyAnswerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select survey_answer_id, company_id, survey_response_id, survey_question_id, value_text, value_rating, value_choice, created_at from survey_answers where survey_answer_id = #{surveyAnswerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select survey_answer_id, company_id, survey_response_id, survey_question_id, value_text, value_rating, value_choice, created_at from survey_answers
